metadata.description: A panel where you can adjust properties of Haptic Events and Meta Data

title: Inspector
body: The Inspector sits on the right hand side of the App, it's where you will adjust most properties

sections.title: Selecting an Item
sections.text: When you select an item either on the Canvas, or within the Timeline, the Inspector will update to show what properties you can edit

sections.title: Selecting Nothing
sections.text: If you select a blank area, the Inspector will revert to it's default state of showing you Metadata for the project
